https://tmrev.io/movie/969234-Dash Dot 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mvseyj0tHsBlZ50ozHwrwz4iCZ8.jpg A completely cameraless hand scratched and coloured film, made by direct animation onto black super-8. All the shapes were scratched in using a draughtsman's stencil, and the colour added with felt tip pens. The soundtrack was made using Hellitron generators. Dash Dot
